resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106972</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106972</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206296</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Environmental Health Science and Technology Education</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klimagesundheit Wissenschaft und 
Technologie-Ausbildung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science de santé et éducation 
environnementales de technologie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência da saúde e instrução ambientais da 
tecnologia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza di salute ed educazione ambientali di 
tecnologia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εκπαίδευση επιστήμης και τεχνολογίας περιβαλλοντικής 
υγείας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia de la salud y educación ambientales de la
tecnología</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">aims to increase student interest and preparation in the environmental health sciences so that they are aware of science career opportunities, and to increase public awareness about the impact of environmental agents on human health so that all citizens can lead healthy andproductive lives.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ziele, zum des Kursteilnehmerinteresses und 
-vorbereitung in die Klimagesundheit Wissenschaften zu erhöhen, damit
sie Wissenschaft Karrieregelegenheiten berücksichtigen, und des 
allgemeinen Bewußtseins über die Auswirkung der Klimamittel auf 
menschliche Gesundheit zu erhöhen, damit alle Bürger gesunde 
andproductive Lebensdauern führen können.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">objectifs pour augmenter l'intérêt et la 
préparation d'étudiant dans les sciences environnementales de santé
de sorte qu'ils se rendent compte des perspectives de carrière de la 
science, et pour augmenter la conscience publique au sujet de l'impact
des agents environnementaux sur la santé humaine de sorte que tous 
les citoyens puissent mener les vies andproductive saines.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">alvos para aumentar o interesse e a preparação 
do estudante nas ciências ambientais da saúde de modo que estejam 
cientes de oportunidades da carreira da ciência, e para aumentar a 
consciência pública sobre o impacto de agentes ambientais na saúde 
humana de modo que todos os cidadãos possam conduzir a vidas 
andproductive saudáveis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">obiettivi per aumentare interesse e la 
preparazione dell'allievo nelle scienze ambientali di salute in modo 
che siano informati delle prospettive di carriera di scienza e per 
aumentare consapevolezza del pubblico circa l'effetto degli agenti 
ambientali su salute umana in moda da potere condurre tutti i 
cittadini le vite andproductive sane.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στόχοι να αυξηθεί το ενδιαφέρον και η προετοιμασία 
σπουδαστών στις επιστήμες περιβαλλοντικής υγείας έτσι ώστε 
γνωρίζουν τις ευκαιρίες σταδιοδρομίας επιστήμης, και να αυξηθεί η
δημόσια ευαισθητοποίηση για τον αντίκτυπο των περιβαλλοντικών 
πρακτόρων στην ανθρώπινη υγεία έτσι ώστε όλοι οι πολίτες 
μπορούν να οδηγήσουν τις υγιείς andproductive ζωές.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">punterías para aumentar interés y la 
preparación del estudiante en las ciencias ambientales de la salud de
modo que estén enterados de oportunidades de la carrera de la 
ciencia, y para aumentar conciencia pública sobre el impacto de 
agentes ambientales en salud humana de modo que todos los ciudadanos 
puedan conducir vidas andproductive sanas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206296</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106972</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/environmental-health-science-and-technology-education</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
